website_summaries.verdict: Nice bristles on this brush that has a dual function with its massage side.
pros: Includes an extra handheld body scrubber brush
It feels good on your skin
Brush works well on rough spots like feet
cons: This brush does not offer 2 types of scrubbing bristles

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve my foot pain!
customer_reviews.text: This is a 2 sided brush. One side is a great bath brush and the other side is for massages. I’ve been using it to massage my feet, and it does a great job in reducing the pain in my feet caused by diabetic neuropathy. Based on the relief I’m getting, this is a wonderful item to have.
customer_reviews.author: cantonman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this shower back brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this brush is not too coarse but also not too soft. It is a great exfoliator and makes washing the unreachable parts of your back reachable!
customer_reviews.author: Kuri Bolger

customer_reviews.title: Feels so good on the back
customer_reviews.text: wonderful brush. Bristles are soft on the back but firm enough to really clean your back. Enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Debra M. Viterito

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy scrubber and hand brush. Long enough and works good. Best scrubber I have purchased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this brush! It makes it so much easier to scrub my back. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Gowen

customer_reviews.title: No more asking for back scratches!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness this is a life saver in and out the shower! The bristles are soft but hard enough to get that amazing feeling of an actual human scratching your back. The massager on the back of the brush is amazing for the more meaty areas on my body, like my legs and booty (lol). You get that extra clean feeling for the hard to reach back area when using the brush in the shower!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jani

customer_reviews.title: Great for massaging head and sore spots
customer_reviews.text: I can now wash my back by myself. I use the hand scrubber for massaging my scalp and sore joints. I used it on my elbow and it help with the pain I was experiencing. The body brush and scrubber are great in the shower. I get a good back and leg cleaning. The scrubber is great for circulation. I would recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: rev don

customer_reviews.title: Good Brush
customer_reviews.text: It was about time for me to get a new replacement brush to scrub my back while taking a shower. I received the product and it was just as described after ordering. The brush looks very sturdy but the bristles are just soft enough. I hope it lasts for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Do this for glowing, soft skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this because it makes a hige difference to the skin. The scaliness does not go away with just a shower puff, the brushing is so key, especially when you're in your 40's. Love the bristles and the massage prongs, they leave my skin glowing and invigorated.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Moldy after use
customer_reviews.text: The brush got moldy and ruined after two months of use. I would have expected it to be protected from moisture since it is used in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for good simple quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set! The brush itself is a little more coarse and scratchy feeling than I prefer but it definitely helps exfoliate my skin. Another pro for me is that the brush isn’t stupid heavy! I’ve had so many brushes that only Thor can pick up. The small pink cellulite rubber thing is also amazing. I’m going to have to buy another set so my husband can have his own. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mason Goforth

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: high quality feeling not cheap work great super happy with them thank you
customer_reviews.author: mrsimport

customer_reviews.title: Wood cracked and split open
customer_reviews.text: It's a little too course but not bad. I'm returned mine in less than 10 days because wood split open on the head of brush. That's bad cause it can get moldy there.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower brush!
customer_reviews.text: I personally loved this brush! I used it in the shower and it is by far my favorite shower brush! You can't beat that price for a great quality brush!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. I dry brush and use it in the shower. It reaches all parts of my back.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ritenour

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday in the mail and tried them out in the shower last night I really like the way it feels!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great shower brush!
customer_reviews.text: Love that the bristles aren't ruff! It's a well made brush and I'm looking forward to using it. My fiance saw it and said he was going to "steal" it from me because it looks great to use! It was a little beat up from shipping, but that happens sometime. Nothing extreme.
customer_reviews.author: jaelynn conklin

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Easy to hold, not heavy to hold. Great length. Really like it! The bristles are just right, not too soft, not too hard
customer_reviews.author: Teri J.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife a month ago, she has used it a handful of times, within two weeks the wood was cracked and it is discolored. The handle is very short and it is rather ineffective as a back scrubber. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Body Brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is well made. Unlike the cheaper ones, the bristles actually stay attached to it.
customer_reviews.author: Southside Trashman

customer_reviews.title: Brush is too hard and scratches your skin
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I thought this would be good replacement for another brush I have used for years but it was not. The bristles are too stiff and scratch your skin. The handle is so short that it can't reach your entire back. I didn't see the measurements until I received the item. Very disappointed and feel like the other reviews were fake. This could only be good for your feet, since they can handle the stiffer bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Butler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set to ad to anyone’s shower routine. My boyfriend and I are both suffering from some pimples on our back this time of year. This brush helps so much because you can actually reach your back with product. The extra pink hand held scrubber is great. I thought it was going to be much smaller but it covers your whole hand. This masked it easy to use on your body or your hair. Is definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Mold on scrubber side of brush after a few days.
customer_reviews.text: The rubber scrubber, on the backside on the brush, turned black with mold a few days after using. I shower daily and we are mold conscious, so we use the bathroom vent every time. We have a large bathroom with a tiled, walk through shower area, so airflow is good.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Lo Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited get those. I'm disabled and have difficulties reaching my back and feet. These make my independance much better. The length is perfect as to not banging into sides of shower. The small hand held was feels like a massage. A very happy customer here!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie O'Keefe EdwardsTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good products!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, feels great and exfoliates. Appears to be high quality. I would purchase again. Could be used for dry brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable and well crafted brush. Just firm enough to wash thoroughly and works as a comfortable back scratcher.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made, seems like it will last quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: WBoo9

customer_reviews.title: Products that Deliver!
customer_reviews.text: Love these products! Long hand is perfect for reaching your back; soft bristles are gentle to the skin and dayside serves as a great massager. Awesome price and speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Pittigher

customer_reviews.title: Brush feels great
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly and were well packaged. The brush is the best part of this item. It's just rough enough to pull at your skin and not hurt. Afterwards the sensation makes you feel clean. I would not use it on face or other sensitive areas. The bumpy side of the brush and the smaller handheld accessory are really massage items rather than skin cleaning tools. You soap them up and use them to massage your muscles. Some might like that more than me, but I've never been into massage.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Check your local drugstore first.
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite purchase of all time but not a bad one overall. In truth, you would be able to get the same thing at Wal-Mart. The bristles are comfortable, not too rough, and effective. The cellulite scrubber is less effective. Perhaps I used it incorrectly but it was rather uncomfortable. So, in closing, not a bad purchase but check your local drugstore first.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband, and he likes it a lot! It helps him to reach and clean his back easily! Also, he can use the another side for messaging!
customer_reviews.author: HC

product_meta.title: Shower Back Brush - Dry/Wet Skin Body Exfoliator - Shower and Bath Scrubber, Wooden Long Handle Body/Bath Brush for Back/Body Scrubber and Cellulite Massager & Remover Brush Mitt Set - 2 Pack
feature_bullets: Body Brush and Cellulite Massager Brush : Create an at-home spa experience with the dual body brush. Cellulite Massager Brush reduce the circumference of the thigh through lipolysis (fat reduction) and improve the appearance of cellulite, it also a hair scalp massage brush, useful for all hair types with soft thick silicone bristles on dry or wet. Package included 1*Body Brush + 1* Body Scrubber Cellulite Massage Brush

Dual Brushes For Wet or Dry Brushing: Stiff boar bristles exfoliate and smooth the skin, including any patches of rough skin. The boar bristles are also great for cleaning hard to reach areas with body wash or scrubs. The second side of the dual body brush has soft nylon bristles that gently cleanse, soften and smooth the skin. Shower Brush perfect for sensitive skin.

Long Extended Reach Handle : Back Brush constructed with lotus wood, the wooden hand is over 14" long. Extended handle allows you to easily clean hard to reach areas such as the back and the feet., the handle of the body bath brush is lightweight and designed to be easy to hold.

Bath Brushing and Massage Tool: 100% natural boar bristles remove dead skin leaving it feeling smoother, will never hurt your skin and good for all kinds of skin, and help to deep clean your body. It works great as a bath brush, Back scrubber and cellulite massager. Available to increase the blood flow by gently stimulating your body with these soft silicone teeth, very helpful to make you relaxed & refreshed
Scientific Design and Simple Maintenance: Light and Durable scrub back/shower brush for men, women, elderly and kids.The handle of the body bath brush is lightweight and designed to be easy to hold.
